mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_SCHEDULE (SCHEDULE_NO, USER_NO, PLACE_NO, SCHEDULE_TITLE, SCHEDULE_DATE, SCHEDULE_MEMO, SCHEDULE_MYCOLOR) VALUES (SCHEDULE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{user_no}, #{place_no}, #{schedule_title}, #{schedule_date}, #{schedule_memo}, #{schedule_mycolor})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_SCHEDULE WHERE SCHEDULE_DATE = #{schedule_date}
SELECT * FROM TB_SCHEDULE WHERE SCHEDULE_DATE >= #{db_startDate} AND SCHEDULE_DATE <= #{db_endDate} AND USER_NO = #{user_no} ORDER BY SCHEDULE_DATE, SCHEDULE_NO
SELECT * FROM TB_SCHEDULE S, TB_PLACE P WHERE S.PLACE_NO = P.PLACE_NO AND SCHEDULE_NO = #{schedule_no}
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_SCHEDULE SET PLACE_NO = #{place_no}, SCHEDULE_TITLE = #{schedule_title}, SCHEDULE_DATE = #{schedule_date}, SCHEDULE_MEMO = #{schedule_memo}, SCHEDULE_MYCOLOR = #{schedule_mycolor} WHERE SCHEDULE_NO = #{schedule_no}
